body.p: Example 41 illustrates the requirements in paragraphs 114–115 and B87–B89 of IFRS 15 on the disaggregation of revenue disclosure. Examples 42–43 illustrate the requirements in paragraphs 120–122 of IFRS 15 for the disclosure of the transaction price allocated to the remaining performance obligations. In addition, the following requirements are illustrated in Example 42:

li.p: paragraph 57 of IFRS 15 on constraining estimates of variable consideration; and
paragraph B16 of IFRS 15 on methods for measuring progress towards complete satisfaction of a performance obligation.
